website_summaries.verdict: A little smaller and more affordable than most other similar models.
pros: Inexpensive unit with sleek stainless-steel design
Compact size fits in small kitchens
Removable crumb tray makes toaster easy to use and clean
cons: Some users found the interior a little smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: Its not for cooking food but simply reheating the types of food that will otherwise turn soggy or mushy in the microwave like pi
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using it for a while now about once a day. Its not for cooking food but simply reheating the types of food that will otherwise turn soggy or mushy in the microwave like pizza. I use it to toast and melt cheese on my sub sandwiches and open faced breakfast sandwiches. I have cooked stuffed green peppers but my family consists of three people and that is all that fits.I had no problems with knobs or otherwise as other reviews mentioned. Easy to clean. Happy overall with product.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this product since beginning of January & it stopped working yestrday. Very disappointed. Oster products r usually very good but this one stopped working after only 7 mos! Ridiculous. And I know I won't get anywhere by trying to get my money refunded so not even gonna try. Don't waste your money on this product... it's junk!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Champaigne

customer_reviews.title: Door broke after a few days
customer_reviews.text: After a week, door broke in the same way other buyers have described in their comments. A broken/bent metal strip prevents the door from either opening all the way or closing. Amazon has made it easy to return for a refund. Keep your box!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it if you want a toaster.
customer_reviews.text: It is almost impossible to adjust the dial to "toast", which the the primary use for which I bought it. The toast setting is positioned between "broil" and the highest oven setting. It does not click into position. You just have to guess if you've hit it or not, and most times you haven't. I certainly wouldn't recommend it to any one who thinks he or she is getting a toaster. The oven part is fine.
customer_reviews.author: VM, PhD

customer_reviews.title: for no good reason.
customer_reviews.text: After 30 days, screw on leftside of door started snagging on metal frame. Now door gets stuck and frame is dented, for no good reason..buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1950's revisited
customer_reviews.text: Four slices toaster? Two slices at a time, TWICE ! Being you have to set the mechanical (clock works) timer each time you toast they will not be toasted the same. This toaster oven uses the same technology that my spouse of 58 years and I bought just after we got married. Most toaster oven stopped using mechanical timers before the telephones stopped using rotary dialing.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Great, inexpensive toaster. Oster makes a great toaster - it heats up quickly which is something very important in a toaster oven. I have bought others that take forever to make a piece of toast, but this works well. I use it to cook frozen french fries and other food as well. It's nice not having to heat up the whole oven to cook something small.
customer_reviews.author: clashcityrockr7

customer_reviews.title: Missing Broiler Rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive toaster oven and works fine. I took one star off because it came without a broiler rack. It had a metal tray, but that was all. Fortunately I had another broiler rack from a previous toaster oven so I can broil meat.
customer_reviews.author: Joan, Eureka, CA

customer_reviews.title: Update,  The timer control broke already.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 70 years old and live alone, this Oster toaster oven is perfect for me, I can make my snacks, fries & fish stix without running my BIG oven. I'm sure this toaster oven makes more than snacks, I'll be trying it out, I can't believe it was under $ 25
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hayson

customer_reviews.title: This product has just wasted a lot of time and effort
customer_reviews.text: If I could have given negative stars, I would have. The first one which arrived never worked. I had to re-package and send everything back. The second one which arrived worked just once. Now I have to re-package and send it back. This product has just wasted a lot of time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my space!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and the size, does not take a lot if counter space. Very basic toaster oven. Bought a few months ago, has worked well since. Perfect for my space!
customer_reviews.author: Cmgp

customer_reviews.title: The Little Beast that Could
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little machine. The reason I went for this is because I recently purchased an Oster blender. I was so impressed with quality, build and design I decided to try their toaster oven. This is my first time ever owning one, wow have I been missing out. Very easy to use and the results have been fantastic without heating up my entire kitchen. In the future, maybe I'll upgrade to a larger model but for now this is plently.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hill

customer_reviews.title: stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Received it July 4th, stopped working august 25. Not what I expected from Oster. Knobs turn for temp and timer but nothing turns on. Am buying a black and decker, wish me luck!
customer_reviews.author: creative carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fit in the kitchen and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My mother loves this! She always used her stove to make simple toast and finally wanted something different. She uses this for so many meals! Easy to fit in the kitchen and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ashro

customer_reviews.title: Problem
customer_reviews.text: I unpacked the item (threw the packing stuff away unfortunately) and placed it on the counter. I started to put the crumb tray in -- pulled on the handle and the right side of the handle fell off. No apparent way to fix. While this may be a great little toaster oven - operating it with only half the handle connected isn't going to be fun!. Why Amazon rates this as their "Choice" is ?????
customer_reviews.author: robert s. hulett

customer_reviews.title: It burns my bread every time on the toast setting ...
customer_reviews.text: It burns my bread every time on the toast setting even at the lowest and shortest time. You have to watch it closely. It’s okay. Nothing great
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a while now and because I live alone, this little toaster oven is great for summer time when I don't want to heat up the whole house but still want to cook or bake. It's a bit difficult to clean but for what it is it seems to be well-made and has held up well. The temperature is accurate as measured by my oven thermometer and the timer is accurate, too.
customer_reviews.author: classicalgeek

customer_reviews.title: Great oven
customer_reviews.text: Luv this toaster oven i baked an apple pie in it, i bent the edges in a little and it came out better in this little oven than my big one....excellent price great product.
customer_reviews.author: Torri H

customer_reviews.title: It is a very useful product for reheating most of the food
customer_reviews.text: It is a very useful product for reheating most of the food. I almost replace it with microwave except for liquid food. The downside about this product is the surface gets way too hot while in use, I got burned accidentally touched the surface a several times. I have to place this item isolated with no other item next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Shann H.

customer_reviews.title: ... exactly what I was looking for and it works great. The only reason I gave it a 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: This toaster oven was exactly what I was looking for and it works great. The only reason I gave it a 4 instead of a five is due to yhe quality if the material. I had a previouse Oyster toaster oven that was for six slices and it lasted over 20 years and the constuction and metal material were solid. The metal material on this Oyster , 4 slices, oven is very thin. But for the price and how it's compacted is worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster over - Looks hi-tech
customer_reviews.text: It's not hi-tech at all, but it's very sharp-looking and with black and chrome appliances in our kitchen, it really looks great. But, more importantly, it works great! Makes perfect toast, heats up my sandwiches so I'm not eating a cold Reuben sandwich, and heat up day-old pizza all the time! Easy to keep clean too. The trays are coated with something that makes them like the non-stick cookware! And Amazon had the best price and free shipping. I'm all over the internet when I shop and only buy for the lowest price (which would include price of item plus shipping costs, if any).
customer_reviews.author: thebonz0

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I got this almost four months ago and it worked like a charm until suddenly it just stopped heating up. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooked our chicken and pizza
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toaster oven. We've had it for about two years and only now have we used it. We've put unbaked pizza and chicken breasts, all which cooked. Pizza took about an hour. The chicken took about 6 hrs at 400 F. Had to put water in the tray every hour or so, to prevent dryness. We'll look for a tray with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: dan bevis

customer_reviews.title: Door won't close after fewer than 20 uses.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it did an ok (not great) job of toasting bagels, large pieces of bread, which is what I bought it for. I probably used it between 15 and 20 times in 4 months, and then the door malfunctioned so that it is in an permanent open position----it will not close. Given shipping costs, not sure if I am going to try to return to company or just consider it a bad decision and move on to a better product.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Vigneau

customer_reviews.title: Great investment.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth $25. I use it everyday for rice, beans, etc etc. I use it the same way one would use a larger oven and it works well for cooking for one. Bought in February, great purchase. and
customer_reviews.author: majesticgoldenrose

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toaster oven if your looking for something small
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toaster oven if your looking for something small. I do not like a cluttered counter. It was easy to hook up and honestly it does the job. Toasts bread quickly and i can fit 6 slices of bread (it's okay if they overlap a little bit) and it cooks my sons nuggets fast. Since it is small and easy, i just put it away in the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Worst Ever...got what I paid for!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst toaster oven. Takes for ever to toast, or cook or anything. Only a few months old but I'm getting rid of it (donating) and buying a REAL toaster. What a disappointment...Thought Oster would be good But, got what I paid for.. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: inletnet

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Well, it doesn't work as well as the one that it replaced, but we are learning to live with it. It takes longer to heat than the other one and I don't believe that it gets as hot, but overall I am pleased. UPDATE: Well, it didn't last a year! The top element melted @ August 10th, so not quite 9 months. Won't purchase Oster product again.
customer_reviews.author: JShirley

customer_reviews.title: The Oster Toaster
customer_reviews.text: My only problem with the Toaster is to remember to turn the heating knob all the way around and then turn it back in order set it for the desired degree of toasting. Why couldn't it just have been set without the turns---my old one allowed that fact.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Damron

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't ask for more. Hasn't given me any issues so far. The only thing I that keeps it from 5 stars is the lack of access for cleaning the inside. It brings a catch tray but things fall all around it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Does not work right
customer_reviews.text: Worst toaster oven ever. My toaster went out and decided I wanted a smaller one. Hard to set controls, just to make toast. Not toasted on half, too browned on other half. Should have bought what I had before
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Neat and looks so good
customer_reviews.text: I love this, and I use it a lot. I bought this a year ago after I moved; unfortunately a lot of my things didn't make the move and my toaster oven was one of the things so, I bought this. I use it for fish, chicken, biscuits--toast, anything. Considering the size and price it's PERFECT! I was looking for something inexpensive and this fills the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: when I have cooked things longer in previous toaster ovens and been highly satisfied, I wouldn't do the smae in this one
customer_reviews.text: So we're on a budget, and bought this for the price. It toasts and does the job. That saying, when I have cooked things longer in previous toaster ovens and been highly satisfied, I wouldn't do the smae in this one. It's a bit uneven, inconsistent, and likes to torch as opposed to toast. But for quick uses it suffices. Okay for a budget. (we move around a lot and can't take much with us, so our favorite toaster oven is in storage).
customer_reviews.author: mav

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This toaster oven is worth it's money! When I moved in with my roommate she had it already. And I use it almost every day. I broil my salmon in it, my veggies and toast bred. My boyfriend loves the food that I make with it that I bought one for him. It was my Christmas gift to him and he loves it, too! It is very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: schmiri

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not complicated
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for. Frame less Glass door is a culprit. Due to the cheap metal part that holds glass door this attempt at modern design fails because cheap metal bends. Other than that it is what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Port Artur

customer_reviews.title: Not a 4 slice toaster
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not a 4 slice toaster. More like 2 slices. Also, the toast function is a little off. Light is medium, medium is dark, and by the trend, I'd assume dark is burnt to a crisp. I haven't tried that yet. Other than that, toaster works great!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon D. Freeland

customer_reviews.title: Gets very hot
customer_reviews.text: Gets very hot and the plastic frame around glass front sticks slightly to the oven when toasting bread. I leave it open after toasting to cool.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Lancelot

customer_reviews.title: Worth $20
customer_reviews.text: Works great, sure toast takes about 7 or 8 minutes but it comes out perfect where ever you set the dial light, med, or dark. For everything else so it has worked perfect for a $20 toaster oven. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Small and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This toaster oven replaces one that was on the huge side. It looks and fits so much better and even though it's smaller it does a very good job and toasting and reheating. We hate to reheat pizza in the microwave because it's always soggy. This makes it toasty and melty and just delicious. It's very easy to clean and looks good with all my stainless appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Janewlmt

customer_reviews.title: 3 years still using it !
customer_reviews.text: I even cook things inside ! it just perfect very fast and resistant ! (VERY VERY VERY VERY HARD TO CLEAN ) but worth it ! I love it ! Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Dugan alcacer

customer_reviews.title: I love to make sandwiches with toasted bread
customer_reviews.text: Well this has become a very handy gadget for me. I love to make sandwiches with toasted bread. But, I'm not sure how to make the bread become toasted top and bottom. I usually have to put it back in the toaster then it gets too dark and hard.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Vilson

customer_reviews.title: Oster TSSTTVVG01 4-Slice Toaster Oven Black - Review
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Price. Very Fast Ship. Item works very well. Build is good with small footprint for the Kitchen Counter. Had a Black & Decker previously for a few years and it finally gave out. Wife liked the design of this unit better than current Black & Deckers...
customer_reviews.author: pi22356

customer_reviews.title: How Have I Lived My Life Without This?
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how I've lived without a toaster oven before. I can now make garlic bread every day if I want. Or bake just a few cookies at a time. Great for heating up leftover pizza. I'm finding more uses every day and, of course, toast!
customer_reviews.author: JulieP

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price kind of tricky to figure ...
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the price kind of tricky to figure out though. On the top dial you have to leave that on "toast" and then select the time you want to toast on the bottom dial. Would be much easier if you only had to use one dial for toasting and the upper dial for the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of My Favorite Kitchen Appliances
customer_reviews.text: The only toaster oven I keep buying. The one previous to this new purchase lasted 10 years! Compact, easy to use, and does the job without any problems. When using it as an oven, I use the top of it as a plate warmer. I hope Oster never discontinues this model.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those with limited space!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small kitchen with low-hanging upper cabinets. It fits perfectly. It is also small enough to be easily stored. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona L. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I liked this toaster fine. But it quit working just after the one year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Toast to Oster
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Oster makes quality products. This is my first toaster oven and I am completely satisfied. It has a small footprint and fits well on my kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: This little toaster oven is great! It's just what I needed for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This little toaster oven is great! It's just what I needed for my kitchen. Cooks food evenly and quickly. I love all the features it has. For the price it cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyGal

customer_reviews.title: Good size for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: It was the right size to fit in our space. So many of the toaster ovens are big Seems to work okay. Nothing fancy... toasts and bakes, that is all we wanted it for!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: it's easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I got this toaster oven 5 months ago and have had no issues with it, it's easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product worked well for a while, then after having trouble with the power going out while using it, I discovered that the cord near the toaster was frayed. Very disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ann A.

customer_reviews.title: quietly does its job
customer_reviews.text: I only use it for toasting and find it works well for that. Haven't tried baking yet. I recommend it because believe it is well made and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Laconti

customer_reviews.title: Works well if you're looking for something simple and inexpensive ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well if you're looking for something simple and inexpensive. We use ours a few times a week without any trouble but do NOT use the included pan to cook eggs (I make breakfast sandwiches for mornings before work) they're impossible to get off
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Got this for baking polymer clay items because it's not a good idea to paid polymer in the oven you use for food. Fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Great simple low cost little toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: Great simple low cost little toaster oven. No kitchen is complete without one especially if I'm only cooking for myself. No need to fire up the big oven for a small personal pizza or the like.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: I changed my 4 star review to 2 stars as ...
customer_reviews.text: I changed my 4 star review to 2 stars as this product burnt out after owning it less than a year. Shame back to using my trusty toaster for my morning bagel.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: The item was dirty and had food all in it when I received ...
customer_reviews.text: The item was dirty and had food all in it when I received it, I didn't think to take a photo before cleaned I just thought I would receive a product that at least would have been cleaned before sent even if used
customer_reviews.author: David Patton

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than it looks. And it doesn’t toast 4. It toasts 2.
customer_reviews.author: Blaire

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: Second purchase. The first one lasted for years! Love this toaster oven, can not do without it. Sure can't go wrong for the price!
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: At this price point I was skeptical of its quality and capability. Months later, I'm very happy with this product. I use it multiple times a day. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great on small counter space
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster oven its small sleek & appears sturdy. Heated frozen items up timely. The only Con is the oven door, it seems to have only 1 hinge on the left none on the right so it makes it a little hard to open but it could be a safety feature so that it does not slam down on the counter. Overall Very happy with it & priced just right for minor cooking/warming
customer_reviews.author: vwmaribug

customer_reviews.title: Cheap toaster oven that works
customer_reviews.text: It works. My toast doesn't burn. It was cheap. I'm happy. When it dies, I'll throw it away and buy another one. For $21, even if it dies in a year, I won't feel like I've been robbed (like my last toaster oven).
customer_reviews.author: Texas V

customer_reviews.title: bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, easy and compact so it fits anywhere a toaster would. Nice toaster once you figure out the timing for the type of bread and a great alternative to warm up your left overs.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster oven. It toasts beautifully and it bakes well and warms up cold food when you need that. Very pleased and it is a good looking item on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster oven sooooo much I gave one to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster oven sooooo much I gave one to my parents and my brother and his family for Christmas. They have reported that they also love the toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie V

customer_reviews.title: Carefull!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster oven based solely on it's low price. I'm really surprised after toaster ovens being made for 30 - 40 years now someone would design one that has an exposed heating element that is so easy to really badly burn your hand on when reaching in to remove toast. It is flat out dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Ligh and small
customer_reviews.text: No problem so far. It makes a sound when the toaster get cold.
customer_reviews.author: Harry B.

customer_reviews.title: Good smaller toaster oven - barely fits 4 pieces but its nice
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but works good. Sometimes the tops and bottoms don't cook evenly but other times it does so it evens out!
customer_reviews.author: SupaMagz

customer_reviews.title: awesome toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: we love it it works great and we can use this instead of our regular oven for some things
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M. Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to replace my old one. I typically use at least 2 - 3 times/wk. Nice and compact. Cute. Great price. Don't bother to shop around.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: I love my Oster Toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase arrive as promised in good condition. The removable crumb tray is nice. Once I got used to the dial, I was very happy. It toasts perfectly every time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Toasts and bakes nicely. Compact size
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Crittenden

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works just like a small oven without heating the whole kitchen. Quick preheating. Toaster makes consistently brown toast. Melts cheese well. Great at reheating pizza. Much more versatile than my old 4 slice upright toaster. The lower timer dial stopped working normally after only 2 months and quit working at all by 4 months. I have an order in for warranty replacement but am still waiting for delivery after 1 more month. Looking at the dial I expect this dial will also fail due to a design fault.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: If you just need a basic toaster oven this is perfect for a good priced.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but....
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with the crumb tray. It's not user friendly and doesn't do a very good job at catching crumbs since it's just a flat piece of metal. How hard is it to put higher sides on a tray. The older models had a real tray, plus the bottom opened for cleaning. On this model the bottom does not open and to clean it you have to shake the hell out of it to get all the crumbs out. Just seems like Oster cheapened it.
customer_reviews.author: wmaura

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent value!! Work great for toast and baking. If you just want a simple toaster oven, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: Smooth transaction. The toaster oven has performed perfectly so far. We are very happy with our purchase and I would recommend this oven for anyone looking for a good, small toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Border

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: i needed a small toaster oven, no frills. The door is difficult to open (malfunction?) and it takes a long time to brown toast
customer_reviews.author: Susan F

customer_reviews.title: The interior is shallow for most of the bread items ...
customer_reviews.text: The interior is shallow for most of the bread items we've used it for. While the door will close the bread gets slightly smashed.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen - Asheville

customer_reviews.title: Timer knob
customer_reviews.text: The timer knob broke after a using it 2 times. Apparently once you’ve set the timer you can’t change it until the timer shuts off. I would like to get a replacement knob if possible. Otherwise I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Worked fairly well to begin with, slow. Tried to fin toast this am and upper element never came on
customer_reviews.author: Don Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a great little toaster oven. I use it everyday, many times a day. Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small for 1person meal
customer_reviews.text: Made to cook or heat 1 person's meal. It is very small. It works. The transparent door desadjusted and I thought i would had to throw it away but it adjusted again by itself thankfully and I still use it. The plate it comes with it is very thin and it has gotten a bad look after some uses. I haven't found another such a small plate to fit in there just as the original one.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana MdA

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and fast to warm
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. Toasts will become dark just before the end of the program so do not let it go till the end. Warming croissants or any viennoisseries is much faster than an oven. Be careful to not let them burn.
customer_reviews.author: GOLDWIN

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: Very good toaster oven for the price. Get it if you can use an inexpensive oven.
customer_reviews.author: Blasterman

customer_reviews.title: they just don't make them like they used to but I guess out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 3.5 stars maybe, they just don't make them like they used to but I guess out of the cheaper ones this one is the safest bet
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mom loves this toaster when she cooks quick fish dishes.
customer_reviews.author: beauti8

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but don't use tin foil!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, affordable price. Beware manufacturer's warnings to NOT use tin foil inside the oven to avoid overheating. My parents melted the plastic handles after they used tin foil and high temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Richard101

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size for the kitchen in our apartment. Accurate temps and settings.

customer_reviews.title: Another great Oster product
customer_reviews.text: I loved my osterizer blender and now I love this little toaster oven. Toasts your muffins quickly so keep an eye!

customer_reviews.title: It is what we hoped it would be and looks ...
customer_reviews.text: It is what we hoped it would be and looks very neat in our kitchen. Doesn't take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know how I ever got along without this oven.
customer_reviews.text: This oven is the best. I use it almost daily. I cover the tray with foil and just toss it after each use. So easy.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Oven at a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: This little toaster oven is perfect for daily toasting and small baking needs.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Bee

customer_reviews.title: Cheap garbage - stopped working properly after 2 weeks - fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: After only about 2 weeks, the toaster dial would "ding" and then continue to stay on - even if I moved the dial back and forward to the bell, it would keep making the ticking noise, heat still on and continue going past where the dial is supposed to stop. I guess the saying " you get what you pay for" applies here. If you had left the room while it was on and heard the "ding" from another room, you would assume it turned off - so it basically burns the food and could be a fire hazard if you do not run back to the kitchen right away. I have already returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Taveira

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Used it for toast, biscuits, muffins. Beats heating up the whole house with the oven. (I'm in Phoenix). I'm a single guy and love the convenience. Looks good, too!
customer_reviews.author: Why?

customer_reviews.text: We are in love with our toaster oven so much better than using the oven and heating the entire house
customer_reviews.author: GEN

customer_reviews.title: Work very well
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected and cooks toast in a reasonable time. I've seen other, more elaborate models that take forever to prepare toast. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little toaster oven!
customer_reviews.text: Since we're challenged with space in our kitchen this oven works well. I've used it to toast, broil and bake and I have no complaints. One thing I will mention though is stay with the oven while its cooking, until you get used to the settings. ie dark for toast means burnt lol so keep an eye on your food til you know what works for you. HTH
customer_reviews.author: MSL

customer_reviews.title: Cooks just as good as an oven without the high energy bill
customer_reviews.text: I Bought two. My mom loves hers it matches here stove! Cooks just as good as an oven without the high energy bill. Thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: redfox13

product_meta.title: Oster Toaster Oven, 4 Slice, Black (TSSTTVVG01)
product_meta.description: With its black finish, silver accents, and energy-efficient operation, the Oster 4-Slice Toaster Oven offers more than just good looks. This small toaster oven provides a spacious interior that can accommodate up to four slices of bread at a time and can be used to bake a veggie casserole, broil fish, and much more. Two manual control dials ensure simple and precise operation. The first dial lets you set the baking temperature to up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit or position it to Toast mode for toasting or Broil mode for broiling. The second dial allows you to set the timer for up to 30 minutes and choose the toast shade setting from light to dark. It can also be turned to the stay-on position for continuous cooking. The adjustable rack can be placed in two positions, allowing you to customize the space. A see-through door lets you check on your food at a glance, while a stay-cool door handle makes opening and closing the door safe. This bread toaster and oven comes with a removable, easy-clean crumb tray and a durable baking pan. Efficient in both design and performance, the Oster 4-Slice Toaster Oven makes a useful addition to any busy kitchen.
feature_bullets: Compact 4-slice toaster oven is perfect for small spaces
Dual dial controls to toast, bake, and broil
Wide temperature range of 150 to 450 degrees F and 30-minute timer with toast shade settings
2 rack positions to accommodate a wide variety of foods from tall roasts to pizza
Includes removable crumb tray and durable baking pan
